ZEXION

▶
Game Trailer

The fate of the galaxy hangs in the balance!

In the peaceful world of Orinth, a mysterious super-matter known as ZEXION has been discovered. This powerful substance has the ability to reshape reality itself. However, its discovery has not gone unnoticed. Pirates, warlords, and horrors from beyond the stars now seek to claim ZEXION for their own nefarious purposes.

As NATU, a legendary space warrior, you must journey to the remote planet Cypher-X72 to secure the ZEXION before it falls into the wrong hands. Armed with your trusty Force Blaster and Gravity Harness, you'll face countless challenges that will test your valor and cunning.

But beware - the path to ZEXION is fraught with danger. Ancient guardians, treacherous terrain, and rival factions stand between you and your mission. Only those with true courage and skill will survive to claim the ultimate prize.

Game Features:

  • Vast Interconnected World
  • Tons of Strange and Cool Upgrades
  • Unhinged Epic Boss Battles
  • Many Hidden Secrets and Mysteries
  • Randomizer for Even More Adventure
